text: veetimmu-lhacce vel`umrate lillah. fein uhsirtum feme-steysera mine-lhedy. vela tahliku ruusekum hatta yebluga-lhedyu mehilleh. femen kane minkum meridan ev bihi ezem mir ra'sihi fefidyetum min siyamin ev sadekatin ev nusuk. feiza emintum. femen temette`a bil`umrati ile-lhacci feme-steysera mine-lhedy. femel lem yecid fesiyamu selaseti eyyamin fi-lhacci veseb`atin iza raca`tum. tilke `aseratun kamileh. zalike limel lem yekun ehluhu hadiri-lmescidi-lharam. vetteku-llahe va`lemu enne-llahe sedidu-l`ikab
